user.title: Choose Authentication Method
user.description: Select how you want to authenticate with ThermoWorks Cloud

data_description.auth_method: Choose Email/Password for traditional login, or Google/Apple for OAuth authentication

google_oauth.title: Google Sign In
google_oauth.description:
1. Sign in to your Google account linked to ThermoWorks
2. Visit this URL (replace YOUR_CLIENT_ID with your Google OAuth Client ID):
{auth_url}
3. After authorizing, copy the ID token from the URL fragment
4. Paste it below

apple_oauth.title: Apple Sign In
apple_oauth.description:
1. Sign in to your Apple ID linked to ThermoWorks
2. Visit this URL (replace YOUR_CLIENT_ID with your Apple Service ID):
{auth_url}
3. After authorizing, copy the ID token from the URL fragment
4. Paste it below

abort.no_id_token: No ID token received from OAuth provider
